game.name: Rome Simulator
game.description:
It is always a great fun when something interesting and engaging hits you! So, this time we have brought to you something that will be enough to keep you occupied for hours. It will be a wonderful chance to mark your presence in the great roman empire army! Join Rome Simulator game and get ready to become the bravest solider of the world! You have the intense fighting skills and the time has come when you prove all that you are the best of all. 
There will be 2 wonderful maps to explore and different 5 weapons you will see at the disposal including a shield.

Don?t miss an opportunity and grab your weapons, while taking the full control of a fearless gladiator! All your enemies are loitering at the palace, so your job in this one of the best shooting games for kids is stop them. You are a one-man army. So, why there is a need to wait anymore. Show all your armed infiltrators that you have chosen a wrong place to enter!

Rome Simulator is a wonderfully designed fighting game where you have to roam all around in the Roman streets while replying all of the guards that you see on your way. Fight and kill them using your ultimate fighting skills! Use WASD or arrow keys to move, 0 to attack, 1 to block, Ishift to toggle run and attack, x to cancel trigger, c to crouch, q to jump, space to dive roll, 1 to sword and shield and 2 for two handed weapon.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Rome Simulator at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: WA,S,D ALL ARROWS-MOVE,MOUSE 0- ATTACK,1,L SHIOFT=-HEAVY ATTACK,MOUSE 1-BLOCK,L SHIFT-TOGGLE RUN,X-CANCEL TRIGGER AND CANCLE LEDGE/DROP WEAPONS,C- CROUCH,Q-JUMP,SPACE- DIVE ROLL,1- SWORD AND SHIELD,2- HANDLE WEAPON,3 BOW,4-DUAL WEAPON,E-USE/TAKE,R-TAKE SECONDERY,G-DRAW/SHEATHE WEAPON,X-DROP UNWIELDED WEAPONS,TAB-PAUSE
